page.title: 18 CUSTOMS AND GAMES
page.content:
THE{CUSTOM}OF{CAROL}SINGING IS A FEATURE OF THIS AREA,BEGINNING ON THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER ARMISTICE TO THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER CHRISTMAS. THE CAROLS SUNG ARE ONLY FOUND IN THIS PART OF ENGLAND. THE SINGING OF LOCAL CAROLS,MAINLY IN IN PUBS BEGAN WHEN MEN CONGREGATED AND BEGAN TO SING TOGETHER. THE NAMES OF THE CAROLS COME FROM LOCAL PLACE NAMES,BUT SOME ARE WELL KNOWN WORDS TO LOCAL TUNES.
INTRODUCING{GAMES. WE FOUND THAT GIRLS LIKE TO PLAY MAINLY SKIPPING, THEY CHANT RHYMES. BOYS LIKE PLAYING FOOTBALL AND CHASE. SOMETIMES GIRLS AND BOYS PLAY CHASE TOGETHER,BUT THESE ARE OUTDOOR GAMES. INDOORS{CHILDREN}PLAY BOARD GAMES.
